text:
How to (finally) create an infographic with AI.

1. Copy and paste this prompt:

"Design a [ASPECT RATIO] infographic.
## SUBJECT MATTER
Topic: [TOPIC]
Central Focus: [MAIN IDEA]
## VISUAL STYLE
Art Style: [SPECIFIC STYLE NAME]
Color Palette: [PRIMARY COLORS] + [ACCENT COLOR]
Background: [BACKGROUND TYPE]
## COMPOSITION & LAYOUT
Structure: [LAYOUT TYPE]
Elements: [SECONDARY ELEMENTS/ICONS]"

2. Make sure to use Nano-Banana from Gemini.

✦ Go to Gemini. 
✦ Click “Tools” and then “create images.” 
✦ Make sure it's on "Thinking" (bottom left).
✦ Use this prompt guide: https://lnkd.in/dh6g5MNd.

3. Bonus trick to remove the "made by AI".

I share the trick in my newsletter (how-to-ai.guide).

But basically, the only way to remove the watermark "made by AI" is to take a screenshot.
